    • 方法详细资料

      • listFilesRelativeToClass

        public static Iterable<FileEntry> listFilesRelativeToClass(Class<?> clazz,
                                           String subdirectory)
                                                    throws IOException
        Lists all files and directories relative to the classpath entry (jar or folder) containing clazz, directly under subdirectory.

        If clazz org.cauli.Foo is in folder /some/path/org/cauli/Foo.clazz, will list files in /some/path/$subdirectory
        If clazz org.cauli.Foo is in jar /some/path/webbit.jar, will list files in /some/path/webbit.jar:$subdirectory

        参数:
        clazz - Any class within the classpath entry to be listed.
        subdirectory - Subdirectory to list. Must be an absolute path, relative to the top level of the classpath entry.
        返回:
        List of files directly in subdirectory, under the classpath entry containing clazz.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • isChild

        private static boolean isChild(String parent,
              String name)
